description:
InstanceCombinations represent instances that make-up a Scenario.
        Note that, when making create and update calls, a Pattern can only be applied to an InstanceCombination once.

cloud_vendor_name.description: The cloud vendor name of the instances.

cloud_name.description: The cloud name of the instances.

cloud_href.description: The href of the cloud in the RightScale API.

datacenter_name.description: Where applicable, the datacenter name of the instances.

platform.description: The base operating system lineage for the instance.

platform_version.description: More detailed information about the instance's operating system. If this is null, the instance is using the 'default' version of the operating system.

monthly_usage_option.description: The number of hours that the instances run for every month.

monthly_usage_hours.description: If monthly_usage_option is set to 'Other', this specifies the hours in the month the instances are running.

assume_sustained_use.description: Whether to use [100% sustained use discount](https://cloud.google.com/compute/pricing#sustained_use) for forecasting. This will be set to `true` automatically if the `cloud_vendor_name` is `"Google"` and `monthly_usage_option` is `"24hours/day"`.

patterns.description: Patterns to apply to the InstanceCombination, in the order that they are to be applied. If no href is specified with the Pattern body then this will create a new Pattern and apply it to the InstanceCombination.

json.body:
{
  "quantity": 743,
  "cloud_vendor_name": "Rackspace",
  "cloud_name": "EC2 us-east-1",
  "cloud_href": "/api/clouds/1",
  "datacenter_name": "us-east-1a",
  "instance_type_name": "m1.small",
  "platform": "Windows",
  "platform_version": "SUSE Linux",
  "monthly_usage_option": "1day/month",
  "monthly_usage_hours": 741,
  "assume_sustained_use": true,
  "patterns": [
    {
      "id": 925,
      "kind": "ca#pattern",
      "href": "/api/patterns/925",
      "name": "Growth pattern",
      "summary": "Increase by 10% every months",
      "type": "permanent",
      "value": 0.0,
      "operation": "set_to",
      "years": "all",
      "months": "all",

      "operation": "decrease",
      "years": "all",
      "months": "all",
      "created_at": "2013-01-19T00:00:00+00:00",

    {
      "id": 672,

}

actions.description: Update the provided attributes of an InstanceCombination.
actions.name: update

cloud_vendor_name.description: The cloud vendor name of the instances.

cloud_name.description: The cloud name of the instances.

cloud_href.description: The href of the cloud in the RightScale API.

datacenter_name.description: Where applicable, the datacenter name of the instances.

platform.description: The base operating system lineage for the instance.

platform_version.description: More detailed information about the instance's operating system. If this is null, the instance is using the 'default' version of the operating system.

monthly_usage_option.description: The number of hours that the instances run for every month.

monthly_usage_hours.description: If monthly_usage_option is set to 'Other', this specifies the hours in the month the instances are running.

assume_sustained_use.description: Whether to use [100% sustained use discount](https://cloud.google.com/compute/pricing#sustained_use) for forecasting. This will be set to `true` automatically if the `cloud_vendor_name` is `"Google"` and `monthly_usage_option` is `"24hours/day"`.
